official_title: A bill to provide for the temporary extension of the activities of the Export-Import Bank of the United States.
subjects: Export-Import Bank of the United States

summary.text: Amends the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to extend the activities of the Export-Import Bank until November 18, 1983.
